name: Odading Bro Web Game - No Ads
name_original: Odading Bro Web Game - No Ads
description:
Odading Bro, the latest Adventure Game that presents a variety of challenges and various enemies, as well as significant levels. Starting from the easiest level and then getting more difficult as the levels change. Prepare a high level of patience.

Control Computer or Laptop :

Use Arrow on Keyboard For the Movement

Use Spacebar for Shoot
